channel.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
channel.description:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-forum-game-hub/51048
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/return-of-the-blue-dragon-survey/64472/17
This SFOL is going to be the best ever and I have high expectations for this game (more words...). If you want to check the real and true to the heart message click on the first survey link.
After a lot of hard work from me to can game, there are 3 forum mafia games alive right now. This is a sufficient amount of forum mafias. There are no SFOL games running but the tournament is running. I feel like now is an excellent time for this. Therefore, I am posting another survey to see whether popular demand is with me on this one and if there is interest.
[poll type=regular public=true] * I 100% agree and now is an Amazing time to host this SFOL * You did some good work, but maybe we need to wait until 1 or 2 more forum mafia games die out. (Meaning go can them) [/poll]
Survey the people give a response and I will base my further actions upon it! Hopefully you agree!

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
I aim at 5 a time. Each with unique mechanics. I learned the hard way that being in Two similar FMs at the same time is hard to balance but an SFoL and an FoL is good

Read full topic

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Absolutely not
FoL and FM are completely seperate
There’s no reason to tell him to wait
If someone can’t join because they’re in too many FMs, that’s THEIR problem, not the SFOL hosts.

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I have middle ground on this

Yes, I am itching to get into new SFoL but wait for few FM’s to die out since there are many of them right now. So not necessary canning.

Read full topic

eh, you do have a point
I’m busy to the point where i won’t join it anyway, so I can be safely ignored
I blame 96/48 btw

item.description:

The only other active non-tournament game is Ici’s mountainous game
There’s no reason to be waiting.

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Forum Mafia and FoL are seperate
Just start the game, there’s no reason to wait. If some people are too overwhelmed to play right now THEY WONT SIGN UP UNTIL THEY ARE READY. If it fills before they are ready, that’s on them. There’s no reason to stall signups for the SFOL.

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
The point of that previous post is that Forum Matches is oversaturated as hell rn and basically ANYONE should wait before posting another

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
I’m waiting before hosting this site’s second minimash (FoLCFM was the first one for context of what a minimash is, a highly complicated setup with lots of crazy events and mechanics, such as ITAs)

Reason is that I need 34 players for it and summer is the best time to get them. Plus ITAs require concnetrated activity, which is hard to get with such things as ‘real life commitments’ and ‘education’

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II

item.title: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
SFoL 24: Casino - Signs ups open (11/16) - Hosted by Braixen
[FM] Factville (Signups Are Open) {9/15} - Hosted by HTM / Nerbins
Forum Mafia “Jobs” (7/16) - Hosted by Firekitten
[FM] Shoot 'em up! [9/12] [Sign-ups] - Hosted by Memesky / Firekitten
[FM] Throne of Riots - Signups open! (8/16) - Hosted by PoisonedSquid / Pug

Here are all the games in signups rn
It is physicially impossible for our playerbase to fill these without at least 10 people being in more than one game, especially with 4 ongoing games already
If you want your SFoL to live then wait.

PS:are you certain you want RotBD to be your magnum opus? It’s a good gamemode but not too impressive

Read full topic
item.source: Return of the Blue Dragon Survey II
